I heart Selena :)

Basically what I think this song is about is that 

"You walk and talk like your some new sensation" 

(somebody thinks their all that).

"you spend your money you don't get a satisfaction"

Selena knows that the person is unhappy

"pick up the phone, nobody's on it"

everyone's setting the person up

"when your falling down and the world starts spen'in out"

they are goin crazy

"and you'll know ill be around"

Selena will be there

that shows how fake people are, and that means selena will have to keep her promise, ("and you'll know I'll be around")

comment_16:
Personally, I think this song is directed towards Miley Cyrus. It doesn't seem like a break up song at all! Her songs directed at boys are quite different if you listen to her other lyrics, she just throws the point out there and usually mentions another girl. 

It seems like the first verse is Miley before her and Selena had their issues and the rest of the song is directed towards the new Miley that everyone hates.
comment_17:
I think that this song is sarcastic.

I mean, listen to the way that she sings it. 

It sounds like she's mad at the person it's directed to. 

Basically, she's saying, "You are a mean a**hole that screwed with my life. So when everyone's dissing you, I'll be right there with them."

At least in my opinion.
